title: The Writer's Almanac - Friday, July 3, 2020
description: It’s the birthday of writer Franz Kafka (1883-1924), who said, “a book should serve as the ax for the frozen sea within us."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of writer Franz Kafka (1883-1924), who said, “a book should serve as the ax for the frozen sea within us."
